Name: Siti Sani
description:
Good day lenders!

Meet one of KBMIâ€™s clients, Siti Sani. She is forty years old and married with one son and two daughters.

Siti Sani is a farmer, which sells rice to earn money for her family. She has been running this business for more than twenty years, and it has been a great contribution to the life of her family, not only to their daily needs but also to her children's educational needs.

She has applied for a loan of 10,000,000 IDR from KBMI to raise additional capital to grow her farming business. Her income is not sufficient for make it happen, but she will be able to repay the loan received.

Siti Sani is a very hardworking mother who always strives for the best for her children and improves living conditions and creates a happy life.

She is very grateful for the opportunity and wants to thank to all lenders.
